title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, April 29, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss describes troop movements in preparation for an expected battle, and describes to his wife his possible role in the battle. He also comments & gives instructions on affairs at home.
keywords: Troop Movement, Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Church/Religious Activity, Military Authority, Women, Family, Home Front, American Civil War
